author: J14T14
title: Seasonal Toy Soldier
review: This little ornament is a nice, small little figure that is great for display. I got this as a Christmas eve gift and I really enjoyed it.The gold string and the 2x2 white tile on the back with the 2016 print are nice editions to any one's collection. The arms can only move sideways and there is no movement in the legs. I liked the choice for the mustache piece, it is a useful piece that I pesonaly don't see too often. You can recognize what this is and it it looks great for its size. I would recommend this to anyone who wants a nice, little holiday LEGO® display item that you can enjoy on your Christmas tree or on a shelf.
